title: 95/203/EC: Commission Decision of 6 June 1995 on the eligibility of expenditure to be incurred by Finland and Sweden on the implementation of pilot projects involving the use of continuous position monitoring systems for fishing vessels (Only the Finnish and Swedish texts are authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 6 June 1995 on the eligibility of expenditure  to be incurred by Finland and Sweden on the implementation of pilot projects involving the use of  continuous position monitoring systems for fishing vessels (Only the Finnish and Swedish texts are  authentic) (95/203/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The expenditure for 1995 shown in the Annex, corresponding to an  amount of ECU 434  932 is eligible for a Community financial contribution of 100  %.
This Decision is addressed to the Republic of Finland and the Kingdom of Sweden.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 6 June 1995.
For the Commission Emma BONINO Member of the Commission
